exam.title: Central de Idiomas. Empresa XXXX | INGLÉS
exam.intro1: En las sucesivas presentaciones usted encontrará preguntas de tipo test relacionadas con la conversación que debe escuchar previamente en la parte izquierda de la misma.
exam.intro2: Después de escuchar la conversación en inglés deberá responder a una de las preguntas de la parte derecha.
exam.intro3: Gracias por su colaboración. A continuación podrá imprimir las respuestas que han sido seleccionadas, o bien imprimirlas en un archivo pdf para su entrega al profesor correspondiente.
exam.timeOver: Su tiempo ha terminado. Pulse finalizar e imprima sus respuestas

answers.answ1: A. It was okay where I left my car
answers.answ2: B. It was not okay where I left my car
answers.answ3: C. I left my car and walked
answers.answ4: D. I always drive on the left

answers.answ3: C. The Bulldog was lying in the middle of the road.
answers.answ4: D. The Bulldog was a week old pup.

answers.answ1: A. I haven’t drunk too much coffee.
answers.answ2: B. I would feel nervous if I didn’t drink so much coffee.
answers.answ3: C. I wouldn’t be nervous if I drank coffee.
answers.answ4: D. I have drunk a lot of coffee.

answers.answ1: A. Motivation and experience determine success.
answers.answ3: C. Experience alone often determines success.

answers.answ1: A. I’m dying to get the new Harry Potter book.
answers.answ2: B. I’ll wait to get the new Harry Potter book.
answers.answ3: C. I couldn’t wait to buy the new Harry Potter book.
answers.answ4: D. I have just bought the new Harry Potter book.

answers.answ1: A. Before long it will be summer.
answers.answ2: B. You can tell it will be a long summer.
answers.answ3: C. We will have to wait for the long days of summer.
answers.answ4: D. I long for the days of summer

question.Question: 7. What can be deduced from this conversation?

answers.answ1: A. John has forgotten the man
answers.answ2: B. John will be back for the man
answers.answ3: C. John is waiting for the man.
answers.answ4: D. John is holding the man up.
